alerts.passwordmigration: We detected that you account go back to Visual Dynamics v1. Before using VD again, please reset your password to complete the migration.

reset-form.title: Reset Password

errors.min-length: Your password must be at least 6 characters long

errors.failed: We couldn't change your password. Either this link is expired and/or already used or the user to which this link was issued to do not exist.

reset-form.reseted: Your password has been reset. You can now sign in and continue using Visual Dynamics

request-form.title: Request Password Reset Link

errors.no-user: Couldn't find a user/account with this username/email

request-form.success: We've mailed you a reset password link. It'll be valid for 10 minutes only.
